alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Rawlins (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 11 at 11:06PM CDT until April 12 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...West winds turn northwest with speeds of 25 to 35 mph and gusts up to 55 mph possible. * WHERE...In Kansas, Rawlins and Cheyenne Counties. In Nebraska, Red Willow, Hitchcock and Dundy Counties. In Colorado, Yuma County. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions associated with strong winds and blowing dust possible.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
